prompts: Create a fierce Bug-type Pokemon with sharp claws and a menacing demeanor.
Imagine a water-resistant creature that thrives in forests and mountains.
Design a Pokemon that combines both aquatic and terrestrial elements for unique adaptability.
Generate a gigantic insect-like Pokemon with a tough exoskeleton and vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon that uses its powerful pincers for both combat and defense.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of resilience and strategy in battles.
I want a Pokemon with a striking appearance that can blend into its surroundings.
